actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Calvin L. Graham.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of a claim against the United States for compensation for service in the U.S. Navy for a specified period and for separation from service payments as of a certain date. Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to reimburse such individual for treatment of dental injuries. Provides that such dental injuries shall be considered a permanent service-connected disability incurred in the line of duty.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Calvin L. Graham.
